entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 a.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Local ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
